Title: Publisher Correction: Long spin diffusion lengths in doped conjugated polymers due to enhanced exchange coupling (Nature Electronics, (2019), 2, 3, (98-107), 10.1038/s41928-019-0222-5)
Abstract: © 2019, Springer Nature Limited.Owing to a technical error, the ‘Published online’ date of this Article originally mistakenly appeared as ‘15 March 2019’, but should have been ‘18 March 2019’.
